ksdk:manifest.name: SDK version 2.5.0 package for EVK-MIMX8MM board
ksdk:manifest.brief: This is SDK version 2.5.0 manifest file. It describes the content of the SDK version 2.5.0 package for EVK-MIMX8MM board and additional settings for tools that support SDK version 2.5.0

board.name: EVK-MIMX8MM
board.description: The evkmimx8mm is an development platform for MIMX8MM3, MIMX8MM4, MIMX8MM5, MIMX8MM6 MCUs

specific.content: The i.MX 8M Mini family of boards provides a powerful and flexible development system for NXPÂ®'s Cortex-M4 MCUs.

device.name: MIMX8MM6
device.description: The MIMX8MM6 are ARM Cortex-M4 and Cortex-A53 based microcontrollers for embedded applications.

specific.content: The MIMX8MM6 are ARM Cortex-M4 and Cortex-A53 based microcontrollers for embedded applications.
